name: Kuka-Way
description:
What is Kuka-Way?

  • Kuka-Way is an arcade style game based around the idea of avoiding rain, previously under the alias of Project Dodging Rain.

What does Kuka-Way feature?

  • Collect small droplets
  • Avoid big droplets & lightning
  • Different behavior among different precipitation
  • Power-ups like umbrellas & raincoats
  • Wait out the storm to get to the next level
  • Beat highscores & input your initials reminiscent to that of classic arcade titles.

Who is in Kuka-Way?

  • Trusty hero, Kuka-Way
  • Baddies
    • Drrop - Rain
    • Splossh - Torrent
    • Flump - Hail
    • Shway - Snow
    • Peel - Thundercloud
    • Illum - Lightning
  • A dog

What are the controls?

  • Use the Keyboard to type in your initals
  • Space to Start & Pause
  • A or Left Arrow to move Left
  • D or Right Arrow to move Right
  • Escape to close the game

Contact

Artwork: @GrafxKid on Twitter, @GrafxKid on Tumblr
